channel.title: Bgm
channel.description:
Hi guys, I'm looking for the right background music for my upcoming game for facebook, all the major free flash game sites, iOS, Android and the BlackBerry Tablet OS. It's basicly a survival shooter in 2D. I'm thinking of using classic music such as bach or mozart, that will give it a special feel when killing in the game. But I'd like to hear some other idea's.
What would you like in a shooting game as BGM?
Here's the thing, the BGM has to be Public Domain (meaning it can't have any copyrights on it).
[size=6]Let's make this clear, anyone who posts in this thread trying to flame me or anything not related to this thread has to grow a life. Really. Mods, approve this thread because I am not insulting anyone here. [/size]

item.title: Bgm
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

I am horrible with musicians names…but there was a husband and wife of musicians…the man like broke his hand or something and couldn’t play the piano anymore.

Anyway, if you can figure out whatever the name of those musicians were either use one of their songs or they had a friend who was a violinist. ( Again cant remember name) but it started with a “V” I believe.

Read full topic

item.title: Bgm
item.dc:creator: @MistaBigBoss MistaBigBoss
item.description:
@MistaBigBoss wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:5, topic:397579”][quote author=MistaBigBoss link=topic=494719.msg3616809#msg3616809 date=1307052783]
flash
…
iOS
…
[/quote]

I lol’d irl

Anyways, techno mixes of classical songs are usually pretty good.[/quote]
I see, the thing is, to build my game on the iOS I’m using the adobe integrated runtime wich IS supported by iOS. It’s not hard to migrate flash applications to AIR.

And it doesn’t work like a flash game on iOS, you have to download it from the iTunes store like you would for any other iOS application.

Read full topic
